director.name: Ridley Scott
director.bio: 5Sir Ridley Scott GBE (born 30 November 1937) is a British filmmaker. [1] He is best known for directing films in the science fiction, crime and historical drama genres. His work is known for its atmospheric and highly concentrated visual style.
